subject: United States Open (Tennis)
Doping (Sports)
lead_paragraph: The U.S. Open champion, the first man to win a Grand Slam title after serving a doping suspension, is one of three newcomers at the ATP World Tour Finals in London.
snippet: The U.S. Open champion, the first man to win a Grand Slam title after serving a doping suspension, is one of three newcomers at the ATP World Tour Finals in London.
